sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Headline1 from './Typography/Headline1';
import Headline2 from './Typography/Headline2';
import Headline3 from './Typography/Headline3';
import Subtitle1 from './Typography/Subtitle1';
import Body1 from './Typography/Body1';
import Body2 from './Typography/Body2';
import Caption1 from './Typography/Caption1';
import Caption2 from './Typography/Caption2';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"typography"}}>{`Typography`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Class101 UI의 Typography는 기기나 뷰포트 크기가 증가함에 따라 적절하게 확대되는 반응형, 모바일 우선 유동 글자 시스템을 지원합니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`데스크탑(lg)에선 쌓이다가 모바일(sm)에선 수평으로 변하는 코드입니다. 브라우저 창의 가로를 늘렸다 줄였다 해보세요!`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`<Headline1>H1 heading</Headline1>
<Headline2>H2 heading</Headline2>
<Headline3>H3 heading</Headline3>
<Subtitle1>H4 Subtitle</Subtitle1>
<Body1>P and div body1</Body1>
<Body2>P and div body2</Body2>
<Caption1>Div caption2</Caption1>
<Caption2>Div caption2</Caption2>`} __scope={{props,Headline1,Headline2,Headline3,Subtitle1,Body1,Body2,Caption1,Caption2}}>
  <Headline1>H1 heading</Headline1>
  <Headline2>H2 heading</Headline2>
  <Headline3>H3 heading</Headline3>
  <Subtitle1>H4 Subtitle</Subtitle1>
  <Body1>P and div body1</Body1>
  <Body2>P and div body2</Body2>
  <Caption1>Div caption2</Caption1>
  <Caption2>Div caption2</Caption2>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"headings"}}>{`Headings`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`이 Grid Container는 중앙 정렬되며, 최대 가로 크기(max-width)를 가집니다.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
